basics.name: Wendy Huang
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am currently an undergraduate student at the University of Hawaii at Manoa's Shidler College of Business studying for a B.B.A. in Marketing, Management Information Systems, and possibly Management. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.area: Marketing, Management Information Systems, and possibly Management (expected Spring, 2025)

work.summary: Conduct advanced clerical work and customer service at the UH Manoa career services center
highlights: Provide instructions and troubleshooting assistance to users of the student employment system
Assist with HR functions including student employment federal paperwork, work eligibility checks, and external employment verifications

work.summary: Demonstrate excellent customer service including greeting customers, making product recommendations, answering client questions
highlights: Handle financial transactions, resolve customer inquiries, keep track of product inventory
Maintain store cleanliness and assist with seasonal layout changes and product organization
Develop social media posts that reflect the organization's ideals
Creating posts monthly for the organization
Led student team for After School All Stars at Ke’elikolani Middle School
Participated in biweekly meetings with other students in the program

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: The Dean’s List recognizes students with a superior academic record, i.e., a minimum current grade point average of 3.5 for 12 or more credits of academic coursework.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: TRIO Manoa Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to students in the TRIO program at UH Manoa in recognition of their academic excellence.

awards.title: Sophomore Merit Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii at Manoa Outreach College
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to up to 30 sophomore UH Manoa students in recognition of their academic excellence.
